verbose_text: Thus, c-MYC, is known to upregulate Rad51 [XREF_BIBR], NFkB, has been shown to increase HR [XREF_BIBR], and KRAS has recently been associated with increased DNA ligase IIIalpha expression and preferential use of microhomology for end joining [XREF_BIBR].
